title: T3 Turkey Reds for sale w/Rhoades
author: T3s

posts.post_title: T3 Turkey Reds for sale w/Rhoades
posts.post_content:
Hello,

T3 Turkey Red prices have been rising and they're getting harder to find.

Here are a few that I hope someone will want. Priced to sell. Prices include insured shipping. Please send me a PM or email if interested and thank you!

Check, M/O or Paypal gift appreciated. Thanks.

IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A SPECIFIC T3, PLEASE LET ME KNOW.  I have many, many others available in my personal collection that I'd consider offering if the price is right, or if you seek a very specific card.

33. Pfeister   PSA-3 $250
30. Mullin PSA-4.5 $475
31. Magee PSA-4(MK) $225
88. Coveleski PSA-2.5 $210
96. Groom  PSA-4 $375
103. Konetchy PSA-3 $255
103. Konetchy PSA-4 $375
114. Rhoades  PSA-2  $650

82. Bransfield (raw) PSA says "Too big" SGC-40? $300
94. Gibson (raw) PSA says "Too big" SGC-60? $545

T9 58. McFarland PSA-3 $175
T9 66. Brown PSA-4(MK) $180

Happy Collecting,
Craig
